title: Title
school_rules_validation: Validation of school rules on the portal needed.
app_description:
Devinci is an app whose goal is to make the use of the student portal of the pole Leonard the Vinci easier.
 ## Thanks : 
 - Robin Bouchet 
 - Antoine Tête (dev)
 - MorningStar (dev & translation)
 Erwan Regnault (translation)
gdpr_consent: Devinci needs your consent to process your personal data for :
notif_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier of your device and a digital fingerprint of your classes of the day (hash) will be sent and processed by our server. Deleted after a maximum of 12 hours
crash_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier and technical specifications of your device and the error report will be sent and processed by Google Crashlytics. By default, this data does not include any personal information such as your name or Devinci identifiers.
analytics_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier and technical characteristics of your device and your application usage habits will be sent and processed by Google Analytics. This information allows to have more relevant error reports and to know the number of users of the application.
gdpr_footer: These settings can be changed at any time from the application settings.
